title: cmd/gotest: delete
body:
by **ankar71**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
darwin amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
d1b75410b793 release.2009-11-17/release

Please provide any additional information below.
It should be possible to use gotest outside the go source tree without the need to
include any 
files from inside the go source tree or following the go source tree directory structure.
